natlang.rdg.libraries
Class CauseLib

java.lang.Object
  natlang.rdg.libraries.CueWordLib
      natlang.rdg.libraries.CauseLib
All Implemented Interfaces:
LibraryConstants
Direct Known Subclasses:
PurposeLib
public class CauseLib
extends CueWordLib
implements LibraryConstants

CauseLib implements the causal part of the cue word taxonomy. The subcategories of the Causal relation are contained in static final Lists. A suitable cue word is found for a relation using its category
